entry.title: RT Token Trees NFT: What are #TokenTrees NFTs you ask? A 🧵 Our Python Dapp scans all the erc721 tokens in your Eth wallet. We use @infura_io to get...
entry.summary: RT Token Trees NFT What are #TokenTrees NFTs you ask? A 🧵 Our Python Dapp scans all the erc721 tokens in your Eth wallet. We use @infura_io to get a bunch of data including all the TokenIds, NFT contract addresses and fromAddresses. Then the Turtle algorithms go into beaver mode. 1/n Token Trees NFT: Beautiful upright tree with complimenting foilage and roots, minted by @MZKZxyz!
